titles.title: Capital Markets Financing and Economic Growth Investments Act of 2023
Capital Markets Financing and Economic Growth Investments Act of 2023
To protect the investment choices of investors in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Capital Markets Financing and Economic Growth Investments Act of 2023
This bill allows a money market fund, under specified conditions, to elect to operate using a different method of valuation than is otherwise required. A money market fund that elects to do so shall not be subject to requirements related to the imposition of liquidity fees. (A money market fund is a type of mutual fund that invests in liquid, short-term assets.)
The Securities and Exchange Commission and securities exchanges are prohibited from enforcing rules or issuing guidance that imposes specified pricing structures or fees on an open-end company. (An open-end company offers securities in pooled investment vehicles such as mutual funds.)
